name: Explo
headline: Customer-facing analytics, lightning fast
description:
Explo allows you to build customer-facing dashboards and reporting, lightning-fast. With Explo, you can create custom white-labeled dashboards for your application, share custom reports, or embed an AI report builder.

- Dashboards: build fully white-labled dashboards for your application or enable your users to create their own dashboards from a library of charts you create

- Report Builder: embed a full self-service analytics experience into your application, allowing your users to create their own tables and charts from scratch

- Email: cadenced and one off emails to share analytics and data with your users

- Explo AI: embed an AI experience into your product to enable your users to gain insights into their data

Explo is built for product teams and developers. We power analytics of all sizes from YC companies to Fortune 500 companies.

# Embed **customer-facing** **analytics** in your product
Quickly deploy interactive dashboards, enable self-serve reporting, and empower end users with embedded analytics.
[Get Started](https://explo.co/</request-a-trial>)[Get Started](https://explo.co/</request-a-trial>)

## Why our customers love Explo
SAVE TIME & MONEY
Save quarters of dev time and deploy embedded analytics at a fraction of the cost in just days.
BUILT FOR YOUR END USER
Give your customers the customization, security, and analytics experience they want via dashboards, self-serve reports, and GenAI.
UNPARALLELED SUPPORT
Explo provides a dedicated and responsive support team to ensure a quick implementation and long-term partnership.

## How does Explo work
Embed Explo into your platform with just a few simple steps
1
CONNECT
### Connect your databases
Connect your database directly to Explo without the need to replicate data or create new data models. Explo supports all relational databases and warehouses.
[See integrations](https://explo.co/</integrations>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65419a85d184dc59f991c5ed_Integrations.png)
2
BUILD
### Build beautiful visualizations
Take advantage of Explo’s flexible components to craft an analytics experience that’s right for your customers.
[Explore components](https://explo.co/<https:/docs.explo.co/creating-dashboards/visualizations/charts>)
[Tables](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[charts](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[KPIS](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[share buttons](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[filters](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[switches](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532730fc153f2d8ccca7daf_image%203074.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b05eec6850c22dbb16ad_i.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b1294c1874402345665c_Group%2048095977.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b16aec6850c22dbc29a8_Group%2048096004.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b1a098e212b1e15fde5a_card.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b1e468f8e9e646711183_iimg5.webp)
3
STYLE
### Style components to match any app
It’s your application, not ours. Our style configurator gives you the flexibility to style your Explo components to natively fit in your application - from fonts to border styles, shadows, and more.
[View dashboard gallery ](https://explo.co/</dashboard-gallery>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65419aa4f8ff1eff01128955_Customization.png)
4
EMBED
### Embed the experience anywhere
Utilize the many different ways Explo provides to share data out to customers. Embed dashboards and reports directly in your application, email it directly, send out share links, or even white-labeled portals.
[See how to embed](https://explo.co/<https:/docs.explo.co/embedding-documentation/option-1-web-component>)
[Embed](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[email](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)[share link](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)[White-label](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b2a53f41a152d554800d_image%203075.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b2c742dc08a7b263e6a5_Group%2048096024.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b2f17f0c5948d53766fc_Frame%201000006217.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b1e4b75961475a3d9e98_Group%2048096042.webp)
## Give end users the customizability they desire
With Explo, you can enable end users to explore and customize their experience based on guardrails you set
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296c40164534e35e14ddfe_Business%2C%20Chart%2C%20Metrics.svg)
EDITABLE DASHBOARD
### Empower users to modify dashboards to their needs
Dashboards are no longer one size fits all solutions. Generalized templates can be effective, but allowing users to modify dashboards to their specific needs allows them to generate a dashboard tailored for their business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296cd3cda3683778028e73_Charts2.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296e223990300a6e9c1560_Business%2C%20Chart%2C%20Metrics2.svg)
REPORT BUILDER
### Allow users to explore data by building ad hoc reports
End users desire to explore data and answer ad hoc questions that dashboards don’t answer. Define datasets in Report Builder and give your users the freedom to explore data and build reports.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296e5c74c6370c081e413f_Charts3.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296faf48e59ef28c854bf2_Business%2C%20Chart%2C%20Metrics3.svg)
EXPLO AI
### Help users answer analytical questions with generative AI
Give end users the power of LLMs and analytics. Let them ask free text questions and get back a chart or graph that best addresses what they are looking for.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296fb8d44fd03c09aef2e6_Charts4.webp)
## Our Success Stories
See how Explo has transformed our customer’s analytics and impacted their business by saving them both time and money.
[Spekit](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-0>)[caju](https://explo.co/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-1>)
### How Spekit used Explo to maximize its SaaS platform offering and Customer Experience
Spekit
Spekit used Explo’s embedded analytics without the time and expense of building their own in-app dashboards
[Read case study](https://explo.co/</case-studies/spekit>)
“With Explo we are able to get the flexibility we need. We are able to get high fidelity and amazing looking dashboards that we can put together really fast at a cost that makes sense for us.”‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50325bbd681758/65298e60af0e864ce191adde_image%203088.png)
Jodi Mesa, VP of Product
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50325bbd681758/6531a114053db433b4b981cd_Frame%2048096319.png)
### Caju reduces ad hoc reports by 95% with Explo
Caju
Caju uses Explo Report Builder facilitating over 52,000 views and 32,000 interactions in the first 30 days.
[Read case study](https://explo.co/</case-studies/caju-reduces-ad-hoc-reports-by-95-with-explo>)
“Since implementing Explo in February, Caju has managed to reduce requests for custom reports by over 95%. Prior to Explo, Caju had an average of 115 report requests. In April, Caju received only 5 requests for custom reports.”
“Since implementing Explo in February, Caju has managed to reduce requests for custom reports by over 95%.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50325bbd681758/653c5f2aa20cd20e8f593d30_samuel%20da%20silva.jpeg)
Samuel da Silva 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50325bbd681758/6539883396e215552a27d31f_Caju%20Frame.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65297f4fd0bf2ad2832779cb_Frame%2048096292.webp)

## Why our customers love Explo
SAVE TIME & MONEY
Save quarters of dev time and deploy embedded analytics at a fraction of the cost in just days.
BUILT FOR YOUR END USER
Give your customers the customization, security, and analytics experience they want via dashboards, self-serve reports, and GenAI.
UNPARALLELED SUPPORT
Explo provides a dedicated and responsive support team to ensure a quick implementation and long-term partnership.

## How does Explo work
Embed Explo into your platform with just a few simple steps
1
CONNECT
### Connect your databases
Connect your database directly to Explo without the need to replicate data or create new data models. Explo supports all relational databases and warehouses.
See integrations⟨45⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65419a85d184dc59f991c5ed_Integrations.png)
2
BUILD
### Build beautiful visualizations
Take advantage of Explo’s flexible components to craft an analytics experience that’s right for your customers.
Explore components⟨46⟩
Tables⟨47⟩charts⟨48⟩KPIS⟨49⟩share buttons⟨50⟩filters⟨51⟩switches⟨52⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532730fc153f2d8ccca7daf_image%203074.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b05eec6850c22dbb16ad_i.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b1294c1874402345665c_Group%2048095977.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b16aec6850c22dbc29a8_Group%2048096004.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b1a098e212b1e15fde5a_card.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/6532b1e468f8e9e646711183_iimg5.webp)
3
STYLE
### Style components to match any app
It’s your application, not ours. Our style configurator gives you the flexibility to style your Explo components to natively fit in your application - from fonts to border styles, shadows, and more.
View dashboard gallery ⟨53⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65419aa4f8ff1eff01128955_Customization.png)
4
EMBED
### Embed the experience anywhere
Utilize the many different ways Explo provides to share data out to customers. Embed dashboards and reports directly in your application, email it directly, send out share links, or even white-labeled portals.
See how to embed⟨54⟩
Embed⟨55⟩email⟨56⟩share link⟨57⟩White-label⟨58⟩

## Give end users the customizability they desire
With Explo, you can enable end users to explore and customize their experience based on guardrails you set
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296c40164534e35e14ddfe_Business%2C%20Chart%2C%20Metrics.svg)
EDITABLE DASHBOARD
### Empower users to modify dashboards to their needs
Dashboards are no longer one size fits all solutions. Generalized templates can be effective, but allowing users to modify dashboards to their specific needs allows them to generate a dashboard tailored for their business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296cd3cda3683778028e73_Charts2.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296e223990300a6e9c1560_Business%2C%20Chart%2C%20Metrics2.svg)
REPORT BUILDER
### Allow users to explore data by building ad hoc reports
End users desire to explore data and answer ad hoc questions that dashboards don’t answer. Define datasets in Report Builder and give your users the freedom to explore data and build reports.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296e5c74c6370c081e413f_Charts3.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296faf48e59ef28c854bf2_Business%2C%20Chart%2C%20Metrics3.svg)
EXPLO AI
### Help users answer analytical questions with generative AI
Give end users the power of LLMs and analytics. Let them ask free text questions and get back a chart or graph that best addresses what they are looking for.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f681c18d50329187681754/65296fb8d44fd03c09aef2e6_Charts4.webp)

### How Spekit used Explo to maximize its SaaS platform offering and Customer Experience
Spekit

### Caju reduces ad hoc reports by 95% with Explo
Caju
Caju uses Explo Report Builder facilitating over 52,000 views and 32,000 interactions in the first 30 days.
Read case study⟨62⟩
“Since implementing Explo in February, Caju has managed to reduce requests for custom reports by over 95%. Prior to Explo, Caju had an average of 115 report requests. In April, Caju received only 5 requests for custom reports.”
“Since implementing Explo in February, Caju has managed to reduce requests for custom reports by over 95%.”

generated_description:
**Explo: The Future of Embedded Analytics**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 batch, **Explo** operates out of San Francisco with a dynamic team of 16. The company has carved a niche in customer-facing analytics, allowing product teams and developers to embed powerful analytics tools directly into their applications. The mission is clear: provide *lightning-fast* analytics experiences that empower end users.

**Core Offerings:**

1. **Dashboards**: Explo enables users to create fully white-labeled dashboards tailored to their applications. Users can either build their own or select from a range of customizable charts.

2. **Report Builder**: This self-service tool lets users create custom reports and visualizations from scratch—no data scientists required.

3. **Explo AI**: Leveraging AI, this feature enables users to gain insights by simply asking questions about their data, translating complex analytics into intuitive visualizations.

4. **Email Reports**: Regular and one-off reports can be sent directly to users, keeping them informed and engaged without requiring them to log into the app.

Explo's tools cater to a wide array of industries, including SaaS, e-commerce, healthcare, and fintech, offering tailored solutions that suit the unique needs of diverse applications. This flexibility makes them a go-to choice for companies ranging from Y Combinator startups to Fortune 500 giants.

**Why Choose Explo?**

- **Efficiency**: Clients have saved significant development time and costs in implementing embedded analytics—what could take months can now be achieved in days.
- **User Experience**: Customers enjoy a customizable and secure analytics environment that elevates their application.
- **Support**: A dedicated support team ensures smooth implementations and long-term partnerships.

Explo's ability to seamlessly integrate into existing platforms without data replication means customers can tap into their existing databases hassle-free. This ease of integration, along with robust security compliance (SOC II, GDPR, HIPAA), empowers organizations to scale confidently and swiftly.

**Customer Success Stories** underline Explo's impact. For instance, Spekit maximized its offering with minimal development effort, while Caju significantly cut down on custom report requests by 95%, thanks to Explo’s intuitive Report Builder.

In a world where data drives decisions, Explo stands out as a powerful ally for product teams aiming to enhance user experience through actionable insights. Ready to get started? Check out their [website](https://explo.co/) for a tour and see how Explo can transform your analytics approach.
